Address: 333 NORTH CANYONS PARKWAY, Livermore, California, 94551, United States of America
CompanyDescription: We provide technology-enabled audit, recovery, outsource customer services, and related analytics services in the United States. Our services help identify improper payments, and in some markets, restructure and recover delinquent or defaulted assets and improper payments for both government and private clients in a broad range of markets. Our clients typically operate in complex and regulated environments and outsource their audit and recovery needs in order to reduce losses on billions of dollars of improper healthcare payments, delinquent state and federal tax and federal treasury, defaulted student loans and other receivables. We also provide complex outsource customer services for clients across our various markets, where we handle many or all aspects of our clients' recovery processes.  ... More ...
